settings.content_info:
Since 2009, 800flower.ae has been delivering beautiful flowers and perfect gifts across the UAE
with fast delivery, and guaranteed freshness.

settings.sub-title1:
We are proud to offer the freshest flowers in town. We have a reputation for quality, dependability,
and creativity that has been built through years of experience in the retail floral industry.

settings.block_content: placed my order in Toronto for delivery in Dubai, and then I needed to change the delivery date after the order was completed. The online order process and the email to adjust the date was extremely easy.

Absolutely fantastic service. They had a question on the delivery address. They kept in touch with me ( living overseas) and kept their word in delivering the flowers to my friend. Thank you 800Flower.ae

Wonderful fresh flowers, delivered as promised on the same day as order - beautiful packaging. 3rd time ordering from them and always lovely! Highly recommend and very efficient delivery, thank you! x

I ordered flowers from the UK to be delivered to my mum in Dubai on her birthday. Flowers and balloons that were delivered were perfect and delivered on time. Great price and service would highly recommend.

settings.description_title:
A collection of stories about gifting ideas, events, and flower care tips
that we totally admire.

settings.text: Trustpilot

settings.title: 800Flower.ae – Your Local Flower Shop for Flower Deliveries in Dubai and Abu Dhabi
settings.content:
If you walk down the streets of Dubai, you will notice one thing in common. There is a flower shop in every corner. Such is the importance of flower bouquets in a Dubai resident’s life that flowers have emerged as the best gifting option. The fresh flowers in our flower shop include roses, tulips, orchids and much more. At the 800flower flowershops, we have beautiful flower arrangements, flower bouquets prepared by our expert florists and indoor plants.. Whatever the gifting occasion, you can be assured that if you order flower delivery online, your bouquet of beautiful flowers will reach on time, and we are committed to providing you the best flower delivery service in Dubai. 800Flower also provides the best flower delivery in Abu Dhabi, providing fresh flower arrangement delivery 7 days a week.

Flowers are the perfect gift for any occasion. Roses are excellent flowers for anniversary, while we have beautiful tulips for birthdays with balloons, and beautiful flowers, teddy bears and baskets for newborn babies. 800Flower also has a wide selection of greeting cards and cakes for delivery. For company and office gifting, we have the perfect combination of cakes, cupcakes and surprises. Flowers are also great for home decoration and to provide fresh air. 800Flower delivers eucalyptus, roses, tulips, bonsai and orchids which can add decor to any home, office reception or home office.

A Fresh flower bouquet is the best gift that you can give to any person. Whether it is your spouse, friend or office colleague a flower bouquet would make an ideal gift for a birthday or celebrate every important occasion in their life, including an anniversary or graduation. Our florists can design beautiful bouquets or the perfect flower arrangement in a vase.

settings.title: 800Flower - Your flower shop in Dubai
settings.content: Located in Dubai Marina and Palm Jumeirah, 800flower was initially launched as a flower shop in Dubai and rapidly grew into a popular retail and online shop for fresh flower bouquet, flower arrangement and gift delivery in the UAE. 800flower offers an outstanding range of flowers, a team of highly experienced florists, a keen understanding of every bloom, and a passion to make every flower arrangement into an art.

settings.title: Express Flower Delivery Dubai
settings.content: Just remembered an important occasion and don’t have time to visit our flower shop in Dubai? Don’t worry, we have the perfect solution. Our online store, 800flower, has over 200 flower bouquet and arrangement ideas to choose from for flower delivery in the UAE. Select the bouquet you like and the florist in Dubai will prepare it with the freshest flowers and deliver it to your doorstep within 3 hours. Available only in Dubai for the time being.

settings.title: Finest Quality from Across the Globe
settings.content: Every bouquet integrates a blend of the finest flowers found in the UAE and imported from reputable growers from all around the world including Holland, South Africa, Vietnam, Taiwan and Columbia. These regions specialize in nurturing each seed from a tender bud to an exquisite bloom.

settings.title: Flowers Dubai for all Occasions
settings.content:
800flower is proud to be a part of numerous successful events including birthday parties, business conferences and wedding festivities.

a) Birthday Flowers in Dubai UAE:
Birthdays are the most celebrated occasion every year and there’s no better way to express your love and best wishes than to surprise the recipient with a carefully picked flower bouquet. It’s admired by young adults and grownups equally and is the best way to wish someone a cheerful and beautiful life ahead. Add on a special Sugarmoo Cake, Cupcake or a delicious box of chocolates for completing your Gift. Don’t forget to check out our 800flower Exclusive cards and helium balloons from the website to make the birthday greetings grander.

b) Corporate Gifts in Dubai UAE:
Flowers play an essential role in events across the UAE. You have to be extremely selective and ensure they suit the theme and style of the event. Our experienced florist in Dubai will discuss your event in detail and suggest the finest quality and trendiest flowers for you. We take care of the complete flower arrangement at the venue and pay utmost attention to the tiniest detail.

c) Wedding’s Gifts in Dubai UAE:
800flower excels at weddings décor and is immensely trusted in Dubai’s wedding industry. From corsages to floral arches, garland to wedding bouquets and flower crowns, we offer an extensive range of floral items for your Big Day. Our Team at 800flower specializes in setting up your day’s floral arrangements our special way, for your special day.

settings.title: Bespoke Bouquets for any Occasion
settings.content: Each masterpiece is fashioned from a rainbow of nature’s bounty, offset with verdant stems and the 800flower signature touch makes each arrangement a real objet d'art. Choose your flower, pick a colour, confirm the size and let 800flower florists do their magic and create a wonderful bouquet for your special day, on the spot.

settings.title: Flower Baskets and Gift Packages in Dubai UAE
settings.content: 800flower offers a wide variety of cheery flower baskets, gift packages and deals of the day. Be sure to check the website for special promotion and discounts every week. Each category includes a mix of carefully picked products to ensure everyone can find the perfect fit for their special occasion.

settings.title: Home Plants and Care
settings.content: Plants make your home lively, fresh and cheerful. 800flower houses a range of home plants that we can deliver to your doorstep. Follow the simple tips accompanied with the plants and water them regularly so that they can last longer and keep your home pleasant all the time.

settings.title: Beautiful Floral Bouquets Made To Order From Florist Dubai
settings.content:
Order exotic flower bouquets at the click of a mouse with online florist Dubai. We are your one-stop destination for all your floral requirements. Whether you are looking for a wedding florist Dubai or a florist Dubai for any special occasion, we are here to cater to your requirements. 

We stock up on a whole range of flowers from roses and lilies to exotic varieties like tulips and orchids. All our flowers are sourced from farms around the world. We deliver fresh flowers all over Dubai. Whether you are looking for florist Dubai mall or Dubai Marina, we are here to deliver your orders. You can order flowers from Dubai florist for same-day delivery or next day delivery. Buying flowers from florist Dubai is now just a cake walk.

settings.section_title: Flower Delivery in Dubai and anywhere in the UAE

settings.title: What type of flowers does 800Flower use?
settings.content: We use a wide variety of fresh flowers like roses, hydrangeas, tulips, lilies, in a beautiful variety of bouquets and arrangements. We also sell home plants including orchids

settings.title: Does 800Flower have a flower shop near me?
settings.content: Yes we have two flower shops in Dubai, located in Dubai Marina and the other at on the Palm Jumeirah. We do offer the best flower delivery in Dubai, Abu Dhabi and flowe delivery across the UAE.

settings.title: Do you provide Express Flower delivery?
settings.content: We offer express flower delivery service across Dubai within 3 hours. We server all the famous areas in Dubai such as Jumeriah Lake Towers (JLT), Dubai Marina, Dubai Mall, Business Bay, Al Barsha, Zayed City, The Palm, Atlantis, etc…

settings.title: What type of Flower Arrangements 800Flower have?
settings.content: We have offer a wide variety flower arrangement to choose from containing the most popular fresh flower varieties (like roses, tulips, lilies, orchids) suiting for every occasion like Birthday, Love, Anniversary, New Baby, and Wedding flowers

settings.title: To which locations do you deliver flowers in Dubai?
settings.content: We deliver flowers in Dubai to homes, offices, schools, hospitals and businesses

settings.title: When do you deliver flowers in Dubai?
settings.content: We deliver flowers in Dubai 7 days a week until 10pm every day. Delivery options are visible on our checkout page
